summary: An ordinance relating to, and specifying and adopting a plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal street railway system; providing for the construction, acquisition of, and payment for, replacement of certain other lines; authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to prepare and adopt plans and specifications therefor and proceed with the construction thereof; declaring the estimated cost thereof as near as may be, and providing for the issuance of warrants on the City Railway Fund in payment thereof.
